CONTROL_IF_ELSE_TOOLTIP: If a value is true, then do the first block of statements.\n' +         'Otherwise, do the second block of statements.
LOGIC_BECOMES_TRUE: กลายเป็นจริง
CONTROL_IF_STATE_CHANGE_TOOLTIP: If input expression is true, then do some statements once.
LOGIC_ONE_TIME: ครั้งเดียว
LOGIC_EQUAL_TOOLTIP: Reports boolean comparison of two inputs.
LOGIC_IS_IN_BETWEEN: มีค่าระหว่าง
LOGIC_BETWEEN_TOOLTIP: Reports True if input is in between the given range.
LOGIC_ANDOR_TOOLTIP: Reports bitwise AND/OR of two inputs.
